commit.message:
Dockerize the app (#25)

* Containerize using Docker (#17)

* Add working Dockerfile

* ci(pulsar): Write CD configuration

* build: Add key system to docker_init.sh

* build: Change environment name

* Revert "build: Add key system to docker_init.sh"

This reverts commit 9bf50547363c0bf776f066c9a1b33fd7870356c4.

* Implement genkey arg

Co-authored-by: Philippe Négrel-Jerzy <negreljerzy.philippe@gmail.com>

* feat(pulsar): add support for ssh between container and host

* fix: update CD

* feat(pulsar): setup required environment variables and volumes for docker

* feat(docker): create rudimentary new api

* fix(pulsar): rewrite backwards compatible API for mounted disks

* fix(docker): disable in-container mounted disks view

* docs(docker): update readme

* v0.9.3

* docs(pulsar): fix typo

Co-authored-by: Brenek Harrison <41010693+BrenekH@users.noreply.github.com>
